Test
---
!3 DPT Build Verification

!4 Build DPT (Force Build)

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                              |
|run   |cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\_DPT.Build.bat|
|check |last exit code           |0                        |
|show  |last output                                        |
|ensure|output contains          |Build successful         |

!4 !-BuildAndRun-! DPT (Smart Build)

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                                    |
|run   |cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\_DPT.BuildAndRun.bat|
|check |last exit code               |0                          |
|show  |last output                                              |
|ensure|output contains              |Skipping build             |

!4 DPT instruction screen

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                  |
|run   |${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\DPT.exe      |
|check |last exit code |0                      |
|show  |last output                            |
|ensure|output contains|!-Build-!              |
|ensure|output contains|!-BuildAndRun-!        |
|ensure|output contains|!-IsPackageRegistered-!|
|ensure|output contains|!-OpenUnit-!           |

!4 DPT instruction screen for !-BuildAndRun-! action

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                                 |
|run   |${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\DPT.exe help !-BuildAndRun-!|
|check |last exit code         |0                             |
|show  |last output                                           |
|ensure|output contains        |!-BuildAndRun-!               |
|ensure|output contains        |!---OnlyIfChanged-!           |
|reject|output contains        |!-IsPackageRegistered-!       |
